trends: There have been 3 other sightings in Gardiner
There was one other sighting in Gardiner on or around July 31st 2007
divs: Sighting DetailsI was watching Old Faithfuls web cam on The National Parks web page, waiting for Her to errupt. At 18:45 (give or take a minute)on July 31 2007 She went off, as I refreshed my page I saw a ufo right in front of Old faithful. I didn't want the screen to refresh on it s own so I quickly set the photo as my background. however I have no idea how to get the picture from my background to be able to submit it here. If you can help with that please email me at Buckeyewoman01@aol.com. Also there had to be about 100 people there, surely someone else witnessed this
Summary: Object appeared as Old Faithful was going off
